Uses of Interface
cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare.ShareContentCustomizeCallback

  • Packages that use ShareContentCustomizeCallback 
    Package Description
    cn.sharesdk.demo  
    cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare  

    • Uses of ShareContentCustomizeCallback in cn.sharesdk.demo

      Classes in cn.sharesdk.demo that implement ShareContentCustomizeCallback 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ShareContentCustomizeDemo
      OnekeyShare allows you to customize share content according to the target platform by implements ShareContentCustomizeCallback and override its #onShare(Platform, ShareParams) method This demo defines a callback to shorten share content of Twitter.

    • Uses of ShareContentCustomizeCallback in cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare

      Classes in cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare that implement ShareContentCustomizeCallback 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReflectableShareContentCustomizeCallback
      此类在Onekeyshare中并无用途，只是在Socialization中考虑到耦合度，需要通过反射的方式操作Onekeyshare， 而原先的ShareContentCustomizeCallback无法完成此需求，故创建本类，以供外部设置操作回调。
      Methods in cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare that return ShareContentCustomizeCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ShareContentCustomizeCallback OnekeyShare.getShareContentCustomizeCallback()
      returns share content customizing callback
      Methods in cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare with parameters of type ShareContentCustomizeCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OnekeyShare.setShareContentCustomizeCallback(ShareContentCustomizeCallback callback)
      setting the share content customizing callback for sharing process
      void ShareCore.setShareContentCustomizeCallback(ShareContentCustomizeCallback callback)
      add a customize share content callback which will be involved before the target platform sharing
